declarations.name: defineCustomElement
declarations.description: Registers the Smurfic custom element and prevents a registration collision

declarations.name: getElement
declarations.description:
Waits for an element satisfying selector to exist, then resolves promise with the element.
Useful for resolving race conditions.

declarations.name: setBooleanAttribute
declarations.description: Sets or removes value based on the value

declarations.name: VALIDITY_STATE_FLAGS
declarations.default:
{
   valueMissing: false,
   typeMismatch: false,
   patternMismatch: false,
   tooLong: false,
   tooShort: false,
   rangeUnderflow: false,
   rangeOverflow: false,
   stepMismatch: false,
   badInput: false,
   customError: false
}
